alert.note: Alert for Eastern Union; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Union and Richmond Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clark, or near Linden, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainfield, Linden, Summit, Tottenville, Clark, Union, Westfield, Rahway, Scotch Plains, Cranford, Roselle, Roselle Park, Kenilworth, Fanwood and Mountainside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
